sentences.en: Palm Springs has ritzy restaurants and glitzy nightlife.
sentences.cn: 棕榈泉有高档餐厅和奢华的夜生活。

sentences.en: New York's energetic nightlife is second to none.
sentences.cn: 纽约充满活力的夜生活不亚于任何地方。

sentences.en: The nightlife is great with bars and clubs right on the doorstep.
sentences.cn: 有这些酒吧和夜总会位于家门口，夜生活真是棒极了。
